subject: Quality controll issue
description_text:
Hello i recently ordered a simsonn plus x accelerator pedal brake pedal and
baseplate from amazon.se, order number :
171-5786813-8653947   Order was placed on 3 of september and arrived on the
6 of september.
The issue is the ”bushing” on the brake pedal that is supposed to make it
more stable is missing. Is it possible to get just this part shipped to me?
If so i could install it myself when it arrives. Thanks!
Marvin Ahrens

conversations.body_text:
Hello again sorry i forgot to include in the last email that the brake
pedal face also is missing 2 adjustment screw holes that makes it possible
to move the pedal up or down is it possible to get this sent aswell?
I have attached an immage of my pedal and the pedal from the picture of
amazon.
Marvin Ahrens

Hi Marvin Ahrens,    Hello, I’ve reviewed the panel image you shared and would like to confirm — did you purchase the Pro Plus model?     The bushing (axle sleeve) and adjustable panel design you mentioned are actually only present in the PlusX pedal series. The Pro Plus model does not include these upgraded mechanical structures.     To ensure we provide the correct technical support and compatible accessories, please help us confirm your exact model. If possible, kindly share your order number or additional photos (including the control box, baseplate, etc.), and we’ll assist you promptly.

Hello yes i ordered the Plus X Pedal, Not the Pro Plus. My order id was
171-5786813-8653947
order was placed on amazon.
Marvin Ahrens
